Class DeviceServiceImpl

org.jscience.server.proto.DeviceServiceGrpc.DeviceServiceImplBase
org.jscience.server.service.DeviceServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.grpc.BindableService, DeviceServiceGrpc.AsyncService
